attributes.action: save the cheque by reminding the banks of their duty to serve the customer - and not vice versa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cheques have been a safe and secure method of transferring money for many years and they still continue to have wide spread use today.  It is not always possible to use electronic technology to make payments, especially for individuals and small businesses and other organisations.
